title: Big Furry Hat | Colbert Classic
description:
From this day forth: you cannot say your favorite band is the Beatles. That's like saying your favorite taste is flavor. Here's a double-header from the vault of one our favorite classic comedy bits: The Big Furry Hat! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
